title: Large Newly Remodeled Edwardian Apartment in the Heart of Cole Valley
app_fee: $30 application fee includes the cost of credit report
posting_body: Please contact agent with any questions or to schedule a showing.
Thank you!
For Rent: 150 Grattan St. #1 San Francisco, CA 94117
Great location just a couple of blocks away from Cole St.
Newly remodeled unit features a new kitchen, refinished hardwood flooring, high ceilings, and still retains much of the period detailing throughout.
Remodeled kitchen with stone countertops and brand new cabinetry.
Appliances include a stainless steel finish dishwasher, laundry unit, gas range, hood, and refrigerator.
Tile Bathroom.
Shared backyard.
Apartment will be available for move-in shortly.
rent - $5000 security deposit
- 1 year lease - tenant pays own PG&E
- no pets
Applications will be available at the showing.
Applicants are required to submit:
- The completed and signed rental application (all proposed occupants age 18 or older must complete the rental application)
- provide written proof of income (copies of paystubs, statements of earnings, etc.)
- $30 application fee includes the cost of credit report
Gross monthly income requirement of 3x the monthly rent.
Agent: Jacob Klestoff, DRE#: 01883910
Office: West & Praszker Realtors
